pages.text: The Blast Furnace is used for crafting 'Steel' and 'Obsidian Steel' and therefore required to advance to high tiers'. The machine has 2 input slots, 1 output slot and an $(l:machine_mechanics#upgrade)upgrade slot$(/l).

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: The left input slot is for ingots, the right input slot for additional materials like coal. The amount of input items, the duration and required power may differ per recipe. $(br)Available Recipes may differ on mod setup and should be viewed with Just Enough Items (JEI).
